org.springframework.cloud.util

Class EnvironmentAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.cloud.util.EnvironmentAccessor

  • public class EnvironmentAccessor
extends Object
    Environment available to the deployed app. The main purpose of this class is to allow unit-testing of CloudConnector implementations that rely on environment
    Author:
    Ramnivas Laddad
